name: Meteor Shower (itch) (skai2blue4u, pyr, Jinn-kyun)
description:
STORY

Lori Lewis has straight As, a comfy student council position, (mostly) supportive friends, and doting parents. No girl in Seaview High could ask for more.

She wants a change, though. Some excitement. Maybe a new boyfriend wouldn't hurt.

Resigned to the monotony of her responsibilities in this tiny coastal town, she bumps into a stranger. Everyone knows him as Seaview's punk.

His name is Taylor Rose.

Could the dicey rumors about him be true? Or is he the change she needs? Could he hold the keys to the excitement she yearns for?

DEMO FEATURES
  • One Love Interest
  • 15, 425 words
  • 2-3 hours read
  • 7 Unique Original BGs
  • 5 CGs and 8 unique sprites with variations
  • Original Soundtrack
FULL GAME
  • Decide when the relationship moves forward
  • Personality based flavor text choice system with no negative consequences
  • An original song written by the main character
  • Cast shenanigans outside the romantic plot
  • Taylor's POV maybe? (tentative)
THE TEAM GOD'S RADIO DEV "POC Indie Visual Novel developers aiming to create musically inclined narrative stories."
